segments.text: Here are some biscuits . Why are you back so early today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My teacher had a sudden stomachache , so the class was cut shot . You ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are cooking at least two hours earlier than the usual .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then it's for Dad , isn't it ? It's so unfair !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be a smarty-pants . It's for Grandma Wang .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's for Grandma Wang . She is sick and her only daughter went abroad weeks ago . So she needs our help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , I didn't know that . But I wanna help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Umm , let me think for a moment . We can meet her together after I finish cooking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll get knee to knee with her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good boy . I can only imagine how happy she will be to see you .
segments.speaker: S2
